Title: Love this product!
Description: I have been using this product for a month now and it's been fantastic. The quality is top-notch and it's exceeded my expectations.

Title: Very satisfied
Description: The product works well, though it took some time to set up. Customer service was helpful and resolved my issues promptly.

Title: This phone sucks
Description: I bought this to use on 5G but turns out it doesn't support 5G. Very bad.

Title: Pretty bad quality for the price
Description: I think this phone should be cheaper for what it is.
